alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 7:44PM EST until December 24 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Chinquapin affecting Duplin County. For the North East Cape Fear River...including Chinquapin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River near Chinquapin. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding adjacent to the river and its tributaries is expected. River access docks are impacted as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EST Thursday was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1045 AM EST.
